text: aur wo kehte hai ke jo cheez un maweshi ke pet mein hai, wo qaalis hamaare mardo ke liye hai aur hamaari aurto par haraam hai aur agar wo murda hai to us mein sab baraabar hai, abhi Allah un ko un ki ghalath bayaani ki saza diye deta hai, bila shubha wo hikmath waala hai aur wo bada ilm waala hai
